alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet; South and East Jackson, Larimer, North and Northeast Grand, Northwest Boulder Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS IMPACTING TRAVEL... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 157 PM MST, an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Livermore to near Cameron Pass, or along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Fort Collins to 71 miles northwest of Denver and moving east at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Trail Ridge, Stove Prairie, Chambers Lake, Pennock Pass, Livermore, Rustic, Pingree Park, Mishawaka, Cameron Pass, Glen Haven, Teds Place, Gould, Bellvue, Poudre Park and Buckhorn Mountain. SAFETY INFO... Road closures are possible and occurring. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
